message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I can get from the product. Would you be willing to consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $750,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $825,000. This still leaves room for you to get a great deal, while allowing me to get a fair price for my product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $775,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $800,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go. Can you consider this offer?
